[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [ElevationProvider](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.md) &gt; [getDisplacementMap](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.getdisplacementmap.md)

## ElevationProvider.getDisplacementMap() method

Get the displacement map for a given tile key. If the displacement map for the given tileKey is not in the cache a lower level tile will be returned.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDisplacementMap(tileKey: TileKey): TileDisplacementMap | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The tile to get the displacement map for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TileDisplacementMap](./harp-mapview.tiledisplacementmap.md) \| undefined

Returns the DisplacmentMap for the given tileKey or a lower level tile. Undefined if the tile or no parent is in the cache.
